title: Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer
description: On Instagram, Patti LuPone apologized after 500 Broadway artists asked her to stop bullying her fellow artists. The post Patti LuPone stuns Broadway as The Apologizer appeared first on AV Club.
author: Matt Schimkowitz

title: Court is now in session for Saul Goodman V. Jimmy McGill in exclusive book excerpt

title: Sullivan’s Crossing Season 3 Finale Ends With a Jaw-Dropping Arrival — Who Is Liam?
description: It’s a good thing Sullivan’s Crossing has been renewed for Season 4, because our girl Maggie has some serious explaining to do. The show’s third season finale, which aired Wednesday on The CW, ends with another attractive stranger coming to town. What’s out of the ordinary about that, you ask? title: The Summer I Turned Pretty Premiere: Jer Commits an Act of Betrayal — Or Did He? You Be the Judge!
description: Warning: This post contains spoilers for the first two episodes of The Summer I Turned Pretty Season 3.  A major bombshell has nearly torn Belly and her soulmate apart, but is Jeremiah to blame?
